/* EmplDac.SelectEmpl */
SELECT EMPL_CODE AS "EmplCode" /*사원코드*/ ,DEPT_CODE AS "DeptCode" /*부서코드*/ , (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM TN_DEPT WHERE DEPT_CODE = A.DEPT_CODE) AS "DeptNm" /* 부서명 */ ,USER_ID AS "UserId" /*사용자ID*/ ,USER_NM AS "UserNm" /*사용자명*/ ,PASSWORD AS "Password" /*비밀번호*/ ,TELNO AS "Telno" /*전화번호*/ ,FN_CRYPTO(MBTLNUM,'D') AS "Mbtlnum" /*휴대폰번호*/ ,EMAIL_ADRES AS "EmailAdres" /*이메일주소*/ ,OFCPS_NM AS "OfcpsNm" /*직위명*/ ,SORT_ORDR AS "SortOrdr" /*정렬순서*/ ,DTY_CN AS "DtyCn" /*직무내용*/ ,USE_AT AS "UseAt" /*사용여부*/ ,EMPLYM_STLE_NM AS "EmplymStleNm" /*고용형태명*/ ,HFFC_AT AS "HffcAt" /*재직여부*/ ,ENCPN_DE AS "EncpnDe" /*입사일자*/ ,RETIRE_DE AS "RetireDe" /*퇴사일자*/ ,REGIST_DT AS "RegistDt" /*등록일시*/ ,UPDT_DT AS "UpdtDt" /*수정일시*/ , (SELECT DUZON_DEPT_CODE FROM TN_DEPT WHERE DEPT_CODE = A.DEPT_CODE) AS "DuzonDeptCode" /* 더존부서코드 */ ,DUZON_EMPL_CODE AS "DuzonEmplCode" /*더존사원코드*/ FROM TN_EMPL A WHERE EMPL_CODE = #EmplCode#

/* EmplDac.SelectEmplTree */ SELECT FLAG AS "Flag" /* 구분 */ , SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(strRank,'-'),2) AS "Id" , NVL(TRIM('-' FROM SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(strRank,'-') ,1, INSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(strRank,'-'),'-',-2))),0) AS "PId" , CODE AS "Code" /* 부서코드 혹은 사용자코드 */ , UPPER_CODE AS "UpperCode" /* 부서코드 혹은 사용자코드 */ , NVL(NAME,'') AS "Name" /* 이름 */ , NVL(CASE WHEN FLAG = 'E' THEN REPLACE(SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(Name,'>'),6),'>'||NAME,'') ELSE SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(Name,'>'),6) END,'') AS "Path" /* 전체경로 */ , USE_AT AS "UseAt" /* 사용여부 */ , REGIST_DT AS "RegistDt" /* 등록일시 */ , UPDT_DT AS "UpdtDt" /* 수정일시 */ FROM ( SELECT CODE , UPPER_CODE , NAME , USE_AT , REGIST_DT , UPDT_DT , rank() over(partition by UPPER_CODE order by UPPER_CODE, CODE) AS strRank , FLAG FROM ( SELECT 'D' AS FLAG , DEPT_CODE AS CODE , UPPER_DEPT_CODE AS UPPER_CODE , DEPT_NM NAME , USE_AT , REGIST_DT , UPDT_DT FROM TN_DEPT WHERE USE_AT = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT 'E' AS FLAG , 'E'||EMPL_CODE AS CODE , DEPT_CODE AS UPPER_CODE , USER_NM AS NAME , USE_AT , REGIST_DT , UPDT_DT FROM TN_EMPL WHERE USE_AT = 'Y' ) ) START WITH UPPER_CODE = '0' CONNECT BY UPPER_CODE = PRIOR CODE ORDER BY NAME ASC

/* EmplDac.SelectEmplList */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.* ,ROWNUM AS "RowNumber" ,COUNT(*) OVER() AS "TotalCount" FROM ( SELECT EMPL_CODE AS "EmplCode" /*사원코드*/ ,DEPT_CODE AS "DeptCode" /*부서코드*/ , (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM TN_DEPT WHERE DEPT_CODE = A.DEPT_CODE) AS "DeptNm" /* 부서명 */ ,USER_ID AS "UserId" /*사용자ID*/ ,USER_NM AS "UserNm" /*사용자명*/ ,PASSWORD AS "Password" /*비밀번호*/ ,TELNO AS "Telno" /*전화번호*/ ,FN_CRYPTO(MBTLNUM,'D') AS "Mbtlnum" /*휴대폰번호*/ ,EMAIL_ADRES AS "EmailAdres" /*이메일주소*/ ,OFCPS_NM AS "OfcpsNm" /*직위명*/ ,SORT_ORDR AS "SortOrdr" /*정렬순서*/ ,DTY_CN AS "DtyCn" /*직무내용*/ ,USE_AT AS "UseAt" /*사용여부*/ ,EMPLYM_STLE_NM AS "EmplymStleNm" /*고용형태명*/ ,HFFC_AT AS "HffcAt" /*재직여부*/ ,ENCPN_DE AS "EncpnDe" /*입사일자*/ ,RETIRE_DE AS "RetireDe" /*퇴사일자*/ ,REGIST_DT AS "RegistDt" /*등록일시*/ ,UPDT_DT AS "UpdtDt" /*수정일시*/ FROM TN_EMPL A WHERE 1=1
AND DEPT_CODE IN ( SELECT DEPT_CODE FROM TN_DEPT WHERE USE_AT = 'Y' START WITH DEPT_CODE = #SearchDeptCode# CONNECT BY UPPER_DEPT_CODE = PRIOR DEPT_CODE ) /* 하위 모든 부서 */
AND DEPT_CODE IN ( SELECT DEPT_CODE FROM TN_DEPT WHERE USE_AT = 'Y' AND DEPT_NM LIKE '%' || #SearchDeptNm# || '%' )
AND USE_AT = #SearchUseAt#
AND USER_NM LIKE '%' || #SearchText# || '%' /* 사원명 */
AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || #SearchText# || '%' /* 사용자ID */
AND EMPL_CODE LIKE '%' || #SearchText# || '%' /* 사원코드 */
AND FN_CRYPTO(MBTLNUM,'D') LIKE '%' || #SearchText# || '%' /* 휴대폰번호 */
AND EMAIL_ADRES LIKE '%' || #SearchText# || '%' /* 이메일주소 */
ORDER BY EMPL_CODE DESC ) A ) WHERE "RowNumber" BETWEEN #StartIndex# AND #EndIndex#

/* EmplDac.OldSelectEmpl */
SELECT EMPL_CODE AS "EmplCode" /*사원코드*/ ,DEPT_CODE AS "DeptCode" /*부서코드*/ , (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM TN_DEPT WHERE DEPT_CODE = A.DEPT_CODE) AS "DeptNm" /* 부서명 */ ,USER_ID AS "UserId" /*사용자ID*/ ,USER_NM AS "UserNm" /*사용자명*/ ,PASSWORD AS "Password" /*비밀번호*/ ,TELNO AS "Telno" /*전화번호*/ ,FN_CRYPTO(MBTLNUM,'D') AS "Mbtlnum" /*휴대폰번호*/ ,EMAIL_ADRES AS "EmailAdres" /*이메일주소*/ ,OFCPS_NM AS "OfcpsNm" /*직위명*/ ,SORT_ORDR AS "SortOrdr" /*정렬순서*/ ,DTY_CN AS "DtyCn" /*직무내용*/ ,USE_AT AS "UseAt" /*사용여부*/ ,EMPLYM_STLE_NM AS "EmplymStleNm" /*고용형태명*/ ,HFFC_AT AS "HffcAt" /*재직여부*/ ,ENCPN_DE AS "EncpnDe" /*입사일자*/ ,RETIRE_DE AS "RetireDe" /*퇴사일자*/ ,REGIST_DT AS "RegistDt" /*등록일시*/ ,UPDT_DT AS "UpdtDt" /*수정일시*/ , (SELECT DUZON_DEPT_CODE FROM TN_DEPT WHERE DEPT_CODE = A.DEPT_CODE) AS "DuzonDeptCode" /* 더존부서코드 */ ,DUZON_EMPL_CODE AS "DuzonEmplCode" /*더존사원코드*/ FROM TN_EMPL A WHERE EMPL_CODE = #EmplCode#
